Docs.summary: Allows clients to query availability and supported resolutions of camera extensions.

Docs.summary: Device-specific extension implementation for automatic selection of particular extension such as HDR or NIGHT depending on the current lighting and environment conditions.

Docs.summary: Device-specific extension implementation which tends to smooth the skin and apply other cosmetic effects to people's faces.

Docs.summary: Device-specific extension implementation which can blur certain regions of the final image thereby "enhancing" focus for all remaining non-blurred parts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Hardware.Camera2.CaptureRequest/Key> GetAvailableCaptureRequestKeys(int32 extension) cil managed
Public Function GetAvailableCaptureRequestKeys (extension As Integer) As ICollection(Of CaptureRequest.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns the set of keys supported by a CaptureRequest submitted in a CameraExtensionSession with a given extension type.
Docs.returns: non-modifiable set of capture keys supported by camera extension session initialized with the given extension type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Android.Hardware.Camera2.CaptureResult/Key> GetAvailableCaptureResultKeys(int32 extension) cil managed
Public Function GetAvailableCaptureResultKeys (extension As Integer) As ICollection(Of CaptureResult.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns the set of keys supported by a CaptureResult passed as an argument to CameraExtensionSession.ExtensionCaptureCallback#onCaptureResultAvailable.
Docs.returns: non-modifiable set of capture result keys supported by camera extension session initialized with the given extension type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Util.Range? GetEstimatedCaptureLatencyRangeMillis (int extension, Android.Util.Size captureOutputSize, int format);
.method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Range GetEstimatedCaptureLatencyRangeMillis(int32 extension, class Android.Util.Size captureOutputSize, int32 format) cil managed
Public Function GetEstimatedCaptureLatencyRangeMillis (extension As Integer, captureOutputSize As Size, format As Integer) As Range
public: Android::Util::Range ^ GetEstimatedCaptureLatencyRangeMillis(int extension, Android::Util::Size ^ captureOutputSize, int format);

Docs.param: size of the capture output surface. If it is not in the supported output sizes, maximum capture output size is used for the estimation
Docs.summary: Returns the estimated capture latency range in milliseconds for the target capture resolution during the calls to CameraExtensionSession#capture.
Docs.returns: the range of estimated minimal and maximal capture latency in milliseconds or null if no capture latency info can be provided

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetExtensionSupportedSizes(int32 extension, class Java.Lang.Class klass) cil managed
Public Function GetExtensionSupportedSizes (extension As Integer, klass As Class) As IList(Of Size)

Docs.summary: Get a list of sizes compatible with klass to use as an output for the repeating request CameraExtensionSession#setRepeatingRequest.
Docs.returns: non-modifiable list of available sizes or an empty list if the Surface output is not supported

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Util.Size> GetExtensionSupportedSizes(int32 extension, int32 format) cil managed
Public Function GetExtensionSupportedSizes (extension As Integer, format As Integer) As IList(Of Size)

Docs.summary: Check whether a given extension is available and return the supported output surface resolutions that can be used for high-quality capture requests via CameraExtensionSession#capture.
Docs.returns: non-modifiable list of available sizes or an empty list if the format is not supported.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
